ModMetaData.name: [T] ExpandedCrops
ModMetaData.author: Telkir
ModMetaData.description:
Expands the selection of fruit and vegetables that your colony can grow and gives a few more options to your colony's kitchen workers.
● Three new crop types - tomatoes, lettuce, and carrots ● Two new meal types - salad requires lettuce and berries, and soup requires tomatoes, carrots, and potatoes ● New bulk cookery bills for cooks who are sufficiently skilled ● New kitchen cupboard that boosts the productivity of a nearby stove
